name: Home - A VR Spacewalk
description: Home puts you at the center of the story, taking you on an emotional and personal journey while delivering beautiful, heart-stopping, and memorable moments.
minimum_requirements: OS: 7, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel® i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent Storage: 850 MB available space Sound Card: Any
recommended_requirements: OS: 7, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel® i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent Storage: 850 MB available space Sound Card: Any
